meaningMnemonic: I <kanji>jammed in</kanji> myself and <kanji>enter</kanji>ed your personal life. Because I care, you know? I don't want you to be addicted to My Little Pony anymore, so this is an <vocabulary>intervention</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
